hero.title: Pain Relief Center
hero.subtitle: Specialized care for pain management and spine health. Personalized treatments to improve your quality of life.

about.title: About Us
about.text1: At Pain Relief Center, we are dedicated to providing comprehensive and compassionate care for patients suffering from acute and chronic pain.
about.text2: Our team of specialists uses the latest techniques and technology to help you regain your well-being and mobility.

service1.title: Interventional Pain Management
service1.desc: Minimally invasive procedures to diagnose and treat pain at its source, including nerve blocks, epidural injections, and more.

service2.title: Physical Therapy
service2.desc: Personalized rehabilitation programs to restore function, reduce pain, and prevent future injuries.

service3.title: Spine Care
service3.desc: Comprehensive evaluation and treatment for spine conditions, from herniated discs to degenerative diseases.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions or want to schedule an appointment? Fill out the form and our team will contact you as soon as possible.
